name: The Amulet of Yith'Sehta
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has excellent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
